The Tangent Variety to the Twisted Cubic

18 Feb 2020

The twisted cubic.

Get the equation of the tangent variety to the twisted cubic, using M2.

i1 : R = QQ[X,Y,Z];

i2 : S = QQ[s,t];

i3 : f = map(S,R,matrix {{t+s, t^2 + 2*s*t, t^3 + 3*s*t^2}});

o3 : RingMap S <--- R

i4 : ker f

             2 2     3      3             2
o4 = ideal(3X Y  - 4X Z - 4Y  + 6X*Y*Z - Z )

o4 : Ideal of R
